about.me: Single pool operator, Member of ASPA (Ardana Stake Pool Alliance), CSPA (Cardano Single Pool Alliance), Mission Driven and F2LB community. Bring the cardano World into Indonesia and the world
about.server: Linode could & Contabo cloud 24/7 uptime, secured. We have 6 Servers: 1 BP Server, 1 Passive Node as BP Backup , 1 public relay, 3 private relay. To improve our performance, we tried every provider and the best among them while we establish our own baremetal server
